goals: Give a historical overview of feminist film theory and queer film theory
Engage with some of the key concepts crucial to the understanding of queer cinematic practices
Survey some of the landmark titles in the history of queer cinema

_course description_

The course setsout to do the following: 1) give a historical overview of feminist film theoryand queer film theory; 2) engage with key concepts crucial to the understandingof queer cinematic practices; 3) survey some of the landmark titles in thehistory of queer cinema; 4) introduce East Asian or Chinese language queerimages and cultures.

_requirements_

1.  grade (subject to change)

attendance andregular participation in discussion. Unexcused absences can affect your grade. Readassigned materials _before_ class and be prepared to give _considered_ response and _talk_ inclass (15%)

3-5 popquizzes (15%)

a 20 min group or individualpresentation on an assigned topic AND its write-up (25%)

a 25 min individual final presentation(15%)

final paper (30%)

2.  you receive _a hefty penalty or even failing grade_ if you

have 5 or more unexcused absences

cause disturbance or interruption oflecture because of _any_ mobile device

commit _plagiarism_ of any form

3.  unless they are legitimately excused, finalpapers are allowed to be 48 hours late for loss of a letter grade; after 48hours they will not be accepted and will be graded F.
